item.title: ND-58 North - Missouri River
item.description: Crossing the Missouri River on ND-58 North. This bridge is a few miles upstream from the confluence with the Yellowstone River.

item.title: ND-200 East at ND-58 North
item.description: ND-200 East at ND-58 North to Williston. Continue east on ND-200 for Watford City.

item.title: ND-200 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on ND-200 East.
